title: Ismo
overview: The title comedy series of the world's funniest man follows Ismo Leikola's strange life in a completely fictional way. The protagonist of the Ismo comedy series, which starts on TV5 on September 6, will drift into the most remarkable situations and coincidences will follow, whether it is a test shoot of a TV show, a remarkable charity project, a drive through Finland or a gig in the middle of nowhere. Ismo deals with current themes that emerge in the episodes of the series in his own inimitable style. In the first production season, the topics range from having children and the importance of one's own appearance to Finnish bureaucracy and prejudice. In addition to Ismo, the most important characters in the series are manager Suipponen (Tuomas Uusitalo) and Vilma's wife (Anna Rimpelä). In addition, the series features many well-known visitors and Actors, e.g. Pirjo Heikkilä, Ville Myllyrinne, Jukka Rasila, André Wickström, Rosa Meriläinen, Juha Laitila, Mr. Ylppö, Satu Paavola, Iikka Forss, Anssi Kela and Jussi Lampi. Ismo is TV5's first Finnish screenplay series. The eight-part series will be shown on the channel on four consecutive Tuesdays, each with two episodes in the tube. Ville Panhelainen is responsible for directing the original series of Elisa Entertainment produced by Mogulmedia. The second season of the series will be published in Elisa Entertainment on September 16.
